## Collider.setScale() method

Scales the collider by the given scalar. Only ball, block, capsule, cone, cylinder, round cylinder are supported.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setScale(scale: Vector3Like): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

scale


</td><td>

[Vector3Like](./server.vector3like.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

\*\*Ratio-based:\*\* Uses ratio-based scaling relative to current scale, not absolute dimensions. Also scales `relativePosition` proportionally.
